ch0254_00_gordie/0101_0701_02_10:
I see you’re very dedicated. Let’s keep
training hard.
ch0254_00_gordie/7101_0701_01_10:
On Pasio, it seems there are a lot of people who
are successful in various fields—not just as
Gym Leaders.
ch0254_00_gordie/7101_0701_02_10:
I’d like to chat with some of them about
fan service in Pokémon battles.
ch0254_00_gordie/7102_0701_01_10: Are you interested in backward somersaults, too?
ch0254_00_gordie/7102_0701_02_10:
The key is to concentrate, but at the beginning,
you just have to go for it.
ch0254_00_gordie/7103_0701_01_10:
In this day and age, it’s important to have a
worldwide perspective, even when it comes to
Pokémon battles.
ch0254_00_gordie/7103_0701_02_10:
That’s why I think my experience here on Pasio
will be good for me.
ch0254_00_gordie/7104_0701_01_10:
I’m always thinking about how to excite the crowd
and win.
ch0254_00_gordie/7104_0701_02_10:
Why don’t you try battling in a way that makes the
crowd go wild, too?
ch0254_00_gordie/7105_0701_02_10: Why don’t you try the Gym Challenge in Galar?
ch0254_00_gordie/7105_0701_03_10:
When you do, I’ll show you my strength as
a Gym Leader.
ch0254_00_gordie/1701_0701_01_10: Just who I wanted to see.
ch0254_00_gordie/1701_0702_01_10: Make use of it. I insist.
ch0254_00_gordie/2501_0701_01_10:
I’ve been able to meet up with other Gym
Leaders on Pasio...
ch0254_00_gordie/2501_0701_02_10: And by talking to them, I noticed something.
ch0254_00_gordie/2501_0701_03_10:
There aren’t many Gym Leaders who fit the image
people would expect from the type of Pokémon
they use.
ch0254_00_gordie/2501_0701_04_10: Each of them has a firmly established style.
ch0254_00_gordie/2501_0702_01_10:
Grant and Roxanne both use Rock-type Pokémon,
but the way they operate is totally different.
ch0254_00_gordie/2501_0702_02_10:
But Brock gives off the impression that his
approach to Rock types is best.
ch0254_00_gordie/2501_0702_03_10:
There’s no correct way to battle, but with
Brock’s style...
ch0254_00_gordie/2501_0702_04_10:
I feel like he brings out the strength of
Rock-type Pokémon.
ch0254_00_gordie/2511_0701_01_10:
My mum is an Ice-type Pokémon user, but I chose
to use Rock-type Pokémon.
ch0254_00_gordie/2511_0701_02_10:
I have zero intention of following my mum’s style,
even if we’re family.
ch0254_00_gordie/2511_0701_03_10:
I’ve clashed with my mum over this, but I have
no regrets.
ch0254_00_gordie/2511_0702_01_10:
Let’s say you planned to gain experience here
on Pasio and become a Gym Leader...
ch0254_00_gordie/2511_0702_02_10:
I’d be curious what type you’d choose—and how
you’d battle.
ch0254_00_gordie/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning. I’m off to do some training.
Care to join me?
ch0254_00_gordie/3003_0701_01_10:
I like to eat well so I can have a strong
body. That’s what helps me win battles!
ch0254_00_gordie/3005_0701_01_10:
Freezing-cold nights remind me of my mum...
She uses Ice-type Pokémon, after all!
